description.full_text:
Collection
2 formats: slab (600x600 mm) or blade (229x1220 mm)
8 exclusives colors
Unique Duo Core construction, reinforced with a glass mat for comfort and stability
Integrated acoustic backing providing 19dB of impact sound insulation
ProtecShield™ varnish for an ultra matte finish and jednostavno održavanje
Beveled edge on all 4 sides

Installation

   Repositionable screw-down installation - compatible with Tehničke karakteristike floors
The fastest installation for large rooms
Installation on ceramic (joint <4mm)
Application
Ideal for moderate traffic applications requiring improved acoustic management: offices, hotels, etc.

Environment

100% reciklabilno at end of life
35% recycled content
TVOC <10μg/m3
Phthalate free
